SEARCH
Package view

Class PhotoAlbumState

java.lang.Object
view.PhotoState
view.PhotoAlbumState
public class PhotoAlbumState extends PhotoState
This class represents the Album State. In this state, thumbnails of photos in the album are shown. Hovering over a photo will show its caption if it has one. The way to access the photo is by doubling clicking. User is able to add, delete, move, copy photos, and close the album. It is a subclass of PhotoState, implementing the State design pattern for Photos.

Modified design of CalculatorController develeoped by Sesh Venogupal
